text:
The monthly farmers’ grievance redressal meeting will be held at the Collector’s office at 10.30 a.m. on January 22.

Officials of various departments including agriculture, horticulture, agriculture engineering, sericulture, fisheries, animal husbandry, cooperative sugar mills, water resources department, forest, and pollution control board will be present at the meeting.

Officials would provide details of action taken on the petitions received from farmers last month. Farmers can participate to resolve their grievances, a press release said. - Staff Reporter
title: Farmers’ grievance meeting on Jan 22
